src:
Rahim Soekasah Legawa Kalah Telak dari Iwan Bule pada Pemilihan Ketum PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 14:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Salah satu kandidat ketua umum PSSI, Rahim Soekasah legawa atas kekalahannya dari Mochamad Irawan pada pemilihan ketua Umum PSSI. Dia juga menerima seluruh rangkaian kongres.
Mochamad Irawan atau yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule terpilih sebagai ketua umum PSSI periode 2019-2023 setelah menang telak dalam kongres Luar Biasa di Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta.
Iwan Bule berhasil mengumpulkan sebanyak 82 suara dari 86 voters pada pemilihan ketua umum. Sedangkan, Rahim Soekasah dan calon lainnya tidak mengantongi satu suara pun.
"Enggak masalah, ini voter sudah nentuin, kita mau ngomong apa, kita harus terima," kata Rahim Soekasah kepada awak media, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
"Kan ini hanya pemilihan ketua, bisa menang bisa kalah," imbuh CEO Bresbane Roar tersebut.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Rahim Soekasah Legawa was defeated by Iwan Bule in the General Election of PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 14:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - One of PSSI's general chairperson candidates, Rahim Soekasah, is relieved of his defeat to Mochamad Irawan in the election of PSSI's chairman. He also received a whole series of congresses.
Mochamad Irawan or who is familiarly called Iwan Bule was elected as the general chair of the PSSI 2019-2023 period after winning a landslide victory at the Extraordinary Congress at Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta.
Iwan Bule managed to collect 82 votes from 86 voters in the general election. Meanwhile, Rahim Soekasah and other candidates did not have any votes.
"No problem, this voter is certain, what do we want to say, we must accept," Rahim Soekasah told the media crew, Saturday (11/2/2019).
"This is only a chairperson election, can win or lose," added the CEO of Bresbane Roar.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
